title: Need help with ID on this font
content:
Hi everyone,

I’m thinking Rockwell or Lubalin, but I may be off.  
Anyone know this one

Thanks

Simon

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20091219051257/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_177.png) | 75.23 KB |
author: levshin22

comments.content:
Hi Simon,

that’s [Courier Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20091219051257/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/courier/m-bold/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D72%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DLove%2520Handles%253F%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26seed%3D26), fattened.  
Note that not all versions of Courier have an angled serif on the top of the ‘d’ and dished serifs on the ‘s’. Those by URW++ and ParaType have.  
F
